concurrency.project.ca.cellsandgrids
Class CellGrid

java.lang.Object
  concurrency.project.ca.cellsandgrids.Grid
      concurrency.project.ca.cellsandgrids.CellGrid

public class CellGrid
extends Grid

Add functionalities to the Grid. It takes care to subdivide the Grid in logical parts (subgrids) that will be maintained by different threads to calculate the state of the contained cells.

Author:
Lorenzo Sfarra - Eneina Gjata
